analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.claimTeamTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0x91c94bee75786fbbfdcfefba1102b68f48a002f4.sol#349-392):
	External calls:
	- assert(bool)(tokenTotalSupply > IERC20Token(tokenAddress).totalSupply()) (/unique_chucks/4/0x91c94bee75786fbbfdcfefba1102b68f48a002f4.sol#381-382)
	- mintAmount = tokenTotalSupply - IERC20Token(tokenAddress).totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/4/0x91c94bee75786fbbfdcfefba1102b68f48a002f4.sol#382-387)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- foundersAndTeamTokensClaimed (/unique_chucks/4/0x91c94bee75786fbbfdcfefba1102b68f48a002f4.sol#388)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.processTransaction (/unique_chucks/4/0x91c94bee75786fbbfdcfefba1102b68f48a002f4.sol#240-278):
	External calls:
	- IToken(tokenAddress).mintTokens(_contributor,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/4/0x91c94bee75786fbbfdcfefba1102b68f48a002f4.sol#267-270)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- contributorList (/unique_chucks/4/0x91c94bee75786fbbfdcfefba1102b68f48a002f4.sol#271-272)
mintAmount in Crowdsale.claimTeamTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0x91c94bee75786fbbfdcfefba1102b68f48a002f4.sol#353-354) is a local variable never initialiazed

Crowdsale.salvageTokensFromContract (/unique_chucks/4/0x91c94bee75786fbbfdcfefba1102b68f48a002f4.sol#289-296) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-IERC20Token(_tokenAddress).transfer(_to,_amount) (/unique_chucks/4/0x91c94bee75786fbbfdcfefba1102b68f48a002f4.sol#295)
